subject: Rowing
lead_paragraph: Harvard easily won the 146th Harvard-Yale Regatta on Saturday, completing the 4-mile, upstream race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 19 minutes 6 seconds.
snippet: Harvard easily won the 146th Harvard-Yale Regatta on Saturday, completing the 4-mile, upstream race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 19 minutes 6 seconds.
